Description: BEAUTIFUL 1 BEDROOM IN A PRIME LOCATION!! Steps to schools like Northeastern, Emmanuel, BU School of Medicine, School of Fashion Design, and many more! Features: *modern kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances *dishwasher *laundry in unit *gleaming hardwood floors *exposed brick *great natural light *modern bath This unit is steps to multiple Green line stops as well as many bars and restaurants in the South End. A perfect location only blocks away from Boston Medical Center, Tufts Medical Center, Boston Sports Club, and numerous restaurants and stores! A perfect location for college students, graduate students and medical professionals!
